mapper.update: update professor set professor_num =#{professorNum}, department_num=#{departmentNum}, professor_id =#{professorId}, professor_pw=#{professorPw}, professor_name =#{professorName}, professor_phone =#{professorPhone}, professor_email =#{professorEmail}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, professor_num professorNum, department_num departmentNum, professor_id professorId, professor_pw professorPw, professor_name professorName, professor_phone professorPhone, professor_email professorEmail from professor) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into professor (professor_num, department_num, professor_id, professor_pw, professor_name, professor_phone, professor_email) values (#{professorNum}, #{departmentNum}, #{professorId}, #{professorPw}, #{professorName}, #{professorPhone}, #{professorEmail})
mapper.select: select department_num departmentNum, department_name departmentName from department
